name: Vice & sin in Vegas city
description:
Welcome back to Las Vegas. The City of vice and sin, money and casino, gun and crime.

Roll up on a dangerous new trip through the city of sin in open-world action game!

Welcome to magnificent and mad LAS VEGAS
Make your way through 40 MISSIONS filled with action
Build up a gangster band to take over Las Vegas city and win mafia wars!

This app includes:
- Exciting car thief simulator.
- Best guns and ammunition. Try out all the weapon arsenal!
- Reworked tank and helicopter.
- Destroyable cars.
- Beautiful Vegas "grand auto" style landscape
- Interesting rap hip hop music
- Secret missions with cheat code

Our app puts the dark, intriguing and ruthless world of the city’s street crimes on your phones. You can tackle 7 different types of motor vehicle theft missions to take over the city and outrun the police.

Download "Vice & sin in Vegas city" for free and win the mafia war between city gangster bands
